outfit_data.top: A  fitted lavender silk blouse with a classic point collar and long sleeves, finished with subtle mother-of-pearl buttons.
outfit_data.bottom: Tailored mint wool trousers with a high waist and straight leg, cut for a streamlined silhouette.
outfit_data.shoes: White leather pointed-toe pumps with a stiletto heel.
outfit_data.extras: A delicate peach silk scarf with a modern geometric print, tied loosely around the neck.   A structured sky blue tweed blazer, belted at the waist to accentuate the fitted silhouette.
